name: Super Wall Builder Bros.
description:
This game is a submission for the GDevelop Game Jam #1

Hans and Hrafnunga-Tófi are two brothers that works as wall builders of the Kingdom of Streichholzschächtelchen.

The problem is that the walls of the kingdom kept being broken by  creatures and monsters.

Help Hans and Hrafnunga-Tófi to rebuid the kingdom's walls!
